attributes.action: Allow country to remove their elected government when they fail to deliver.
attributes.additional_details: The government and parliament exist to serve the best interests of the electorate, they are employed by the electorate. If the electorate feels the people who govern them has failed to deliver what they have promised they should be able to call for an instant general election. There should be 2 tiers one percentage of the last election turn out would call for the instant dismissal of the pm and another higher percentage for an instant general election.
attributes.background: The government exists to serve the electorate if they fail to deliver the electorate should be able to call for an instant general election or the removal of the current pm based on the number of aggrieved against the number who voted in the last election

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

Change the law, so that UK citizens can force an immediate General Election

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702341
